<<<<<<< HEAD
An alarm to all flesh with an invitation to the true seeker forthwith to flye for his life (clearly) out of the short-lived Babylon into the life ... also, a word of encouragement to the faithful to be faithful still / by E.B. Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662. Billing, Edward, 1623-1686.
[2], 10 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson, London : 1660.
Variously attributed to Edward Billing and Edward Burrough. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
=======

[2], 10 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson, London : 1660.
Variously attributed to Edward Billing and Edward Burrough. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
